metadata.title: Carbonate Chemistry of the Bering Sea

creators.name: National Sun Yat-sen University, Institute of Marine Geology

metadata.description: Concurrent oxygen, pH, and calcium total alkalinity were measured in the eastern Bering Sea in the late winter of 1983. The carbon fluxes were estimated.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To collect data in the winter, to estimate the anthropogenic CO2 sequestered in the Bering Sea.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned
